content: Ok, this sounds amazing. So where I am putting all the things that you just told me to create? He needs the contents of my secrets as well. This can be the initial prompt to him maybe? That is a secure way that we all said we could communicate that information to him, so after that, he'll have access securely to it on my machine, so what he builds can work with it through me. Tell me briefly where everything needs to go, make any updates with the same filenames that you want to make, and let me know what the prompt needs to be for him to understand what he needs to do once I hit enter.
